summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein for transportation charges incurred on May 20, 2003. The total amount due is $89.87, with details of the shipments and charges outlined across multiple pages.

keyFacts: The invoice is dated May 27, 2003, and is addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein.
The total amount due on the invoice is $89.87.
The invoice details multiple shipments picked up by FedEx on various dates in May 2003.
The invoice includes charges for transportation and special handling.
Several individuals are mentioned in connection with the shipments, including Jeanne Brennan and Lesley.
